name: Re-ideation 2021
description:
Re-ideation: Virtual Exhibit will let you appreciate artworks in the comfort of your home with the use of your electronic devices. During this health crisis, we must innovate new ways to appreciate the different artworks crafted by the multimedia arts and animation students. This virtual exhibit was made possible by the programmers of CIIT batch 2020-2021.

In case you didn't get to see the survey form in-game here is the link: 
Feedback for Re-Ideation: Virtual Exhibit

As much as possible please respond to the survey, as it serves as a counter on how many people visited the Re-ideation.

Controls: 

WASD = forward, left, down, right

Left click = interact / drag the artworks

E = go back from interact menu

P = Pause Menu

Mouse Wheel = zoom in / out of the artworks

Inspect Button = Shows up when interacting with artworks, it lets you inspect the artwork letting you have a closer look.
